STABLEâ€” wheels that protect you

Do you or a loved one use a walker? Are you or they ready to become more mobile? Try STABLE! These are wheels with enhanced safety features that can be easily attached to your current walker.

STABLE is our solution to improving the experience of using rollators currently on the market.

How it works:

1

Enter your walker information

Our selections of wheels are customized to fit most common walkers in the market.

2

Get your new STABLE wheels

The wheels will be delivered to your door together with an installation kit.

3

Easily install STABLE to your walker

STABLE wheels are made so that you can install them yourself. We also provide installation service at a fee.

Features

Detect sudden acceleration

Fully collapsible into a compact portable walker that you can take on your travels.

Engage auto-locking

Take a seat whenever you need a break while walking.

Provide stable support

Wheels detecting sudden acceleration will lock automatically to prevent falls.
